results.definition: the act of losing or surrendering something as a penalty for a mistake or fault or failure to perform etc.
something that is lost or surrendered as a penalty
a penalty for a fault or mistake that involves losing or giving up something
examples: the contract specified forfeits if the work was not completed on time

results.definition: lose (s.th.) or lose the right to (s.th.) by some error, offense, or crime
examples: you've forfeited your right to name your successor
